numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice a pattern in sports teams.
2. For about every three players of color, there is only one head coach or manager of color.
3. I wonder whether each team has a similar proportion of players of color.
4. I wonder whether some teams have almost all players of color.
5. I wonder whether some teams have almost no players of color.
6. A large majority of players are people of color.
7. This pattern impacts me and my community.
8. This pattern involves biases and expectations.
9. In sports teams, many people in power are white people.
10. People of color contribute to the success of sports teams.
11. This situation may prevent people of color from getting leadership positions in the future.
12. If change is not actively sought, then this situation may continue.
13. The headline is: People of Color are the Driving Force of Major League Sports Teams, but who is in charge: Racial disparity in sports.
